scripts.deploy: yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy  --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ opynfinance/squeeth
scripts.deploy:satsuma: yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy squeeth --node https://app.satsuma.xyz/api/subgraphs/deploy --version-label v0.0.2
scripts.deploy:ropsten: yarn prepare:ropsten && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ opynfinance/squeeth-ropsten
